translate.ns_transfer_instructions: Please enter the domain name and extension below
translate.register_instructions: Please enter the name and select an extension below
translate.register_instructions_s: Please enter the desired domain name and select an extension above
translate.domain_unavail: The specified domain is invalid or not available, please try another...
translate.domain_avail: Congratulations! The domain is available, you can purchase this hosting plan now.
translate.domain_avail_s: Congratulations! The domain is available, you can purchase it now.
translate.transfer_searching: Checking if domain can be transferred, please hold....
translate.transfer_unavail: The specified domain is invalid, unregistered, or unsupported by our registrar, please try another domain or select the "update nameserver" option above instead...
translate.transfer_avail: Congratulations! The domain can be transferred to our registrar, you may now purchase this hosting plan.
translate.transfer_avail_s: Congratulations! The domain can be transferred to our registrar, you may now continue the transfer.
translate.domain_register: Register or Park a new domain
translate.suggest_select: Please make your selection(s) from the list above then press continue
translate.search_mass_instructions:
Please enter the list of domains to search on the left, separated by a new line.

Example:

domain123.com
domain345.net
domain456.org
translate.search_mass_err_tld: The TLD %%tld%% is not accepted and the domain %%domain%% has been removed.
translate.search_mass_err_dom: The domain %%domain%% is not available and has been removed.
